name: Fight Club 2
description:
Don’t miss your chance to become fighting game Legendary. It is an interactive action game which demands some basic strategic skills.

Destroy the enemy base to stop all kind of corruptions and smuggle dealings. Each stages of the game leave you in different places to explore more and find your trapped teammates. Don’t forget to upgrade your stamina to fight against powerful rivals. Customize your player in each stages to destroy the evil forces easily as game progress.

Fight Club 2 Game Features:
• High Quality Fights
• Excellent animation and sounds
• Immortal Fighters
• Incredibly realistic game play.
• Smooth UI

Put on gloves and keep you fists ready to eliminate all bad guys.
